name: Pyotr Alexeyevich Kropotkin
main_interests: Anarchism, Agriculture, Labor, Class struggle, Mutualism (biology)
notable_ideas: Founder of anarchist communism, four-hour workday, author of ''The Conquest of Bread'', ''Mutual Aid: A Factor of Evolution'', ''Fields, Factories and Workshops''
influenced: Berkman, Malatesta, Wilde, Tolstoy, Most, Magón, Goldman, Makhno, Rocker, Brown, Ward, Galleani, Bookchin, Volin, Nikiforova, Grave, Revolutionary Insurrectionary Army of Ukraine, Black CrimethInc., Anarchist Federation, Zabalaza
